item.title: The 3-2-1 Backup Rule: A Proven Strategy for Data Protection
item.description: Data loss can happen in many ways—whether due to accidental deletion, cyberattacks, hardware failure, or even a catastrophic event like a data center fire. To protect against these risks, IT professionals have long relied on the 3-2-1 backup rule, a fundamental strategy for ensuring data resilience.
